sql_query: SELECT T2.dept_store_id ,  T2.store_name FROM departments AS T1 JOIN department_stores AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_id  =  T2.dept_store_id WHERE T1.department_name  =  "marketing" INTERSECT SELECT T2.dept_store_id ,  T2.store_name FROM departments AS T1 JOIN department_stores AS T2 ON T1.dept_store_id  =  T2.dept_store_id WHERE T1.department_name  =  "managing"
question: What are the department store IDs and names of stores that have both a marketing department and a managing department?
